## Source: ossf-package-analysis (406ece3d7b2065e75e6e60e1859092f74a6993d2b5aa2219196c1e0b1fec2e6e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'handlebars-formatter' @ 10.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
